com.appboy.configuration

Class XmlAppConfigurationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appboy.configuration.CachedConfigurationProvider
      • com.appboy.configuration.XmlAppConfigurationProvider

  • public class XmlAppConfigurationProvider
extends CachedConfigurationProvider
    This configuration provider pulls values from the Appboy.xml provided by the client. Values set by the Appboy.configure() method can override the xml static values via an override cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseUrlForRequests

        public java.lang.String getBaseUrlForRequests()

      • getAppboyApiKeyStringFromLocaleMapping

        public java.lang.String getAppboyApiKeyStringFromLocaleMapping(java.util.Locale localeToMatch)
        Attempts to return the api key from the XML based on the current locale. If the mapping is not present, returns null. If the mapping is present, but the current locale is not mapped, returns null.

        This method expects locale -> apiKey string mappings in the form "LOCALE,API_KEY" and is delimited by a comma. If matched, the returned locale is trimmed.
        Parameters:
        localeToMatch - the Locale to associate the api key.
        Returns:
        api key based on the current locale, or null.
